  • Constructor Details

    • MovablePiece

      public MovablePiece(int x, int y, String imagePath, int rank, boolean isBlue)
      Constructor of piece, initializing it alive (isDead=false)
      Parameters:
      x - x-coordinate
      y - y-coordinate
      rank - rank/power
      imagePath - path in the src where to get the image from
      isBlue - if it is in the Blue or Red team

  • Method Details

    • getPossibleMoves

      public List<Coordinates> getPossibleMoves()
      Possible moves are returned as Coordinate objects which store (x,y) values
      Returns:
      an Integer array of possible moves

    • move

      public void move(Coordinates newPos) throws InvalidCoordinatesException
      pre-conditions coordinates are already set, here it just changes them post-condition new coordinates are set and are valid from the caller, no checking required
      Parameters:
      newPos -
      Throws:
      InvalidCoordinatesException - when the Coordinates sent are invalid

    • attack

      public void attack(Piece Enemy) throws DeadPieceException
      method to simulate attack pre-condition this Piece is not Dead post-condition this OR enemy OR both Pieces are defeated
      Parameters:
      Enemy - an enemy Piece sent by the controller
      Throws:
      DeadPieceException - if this piece trying to attack or is attacked is dead

    • WasRevived

      public boolean WasRevived()
      Returns:
      if this piece was revived before

    • setRevived

      public void setRevived()
      Set true when this piece was revived ,so it won't be again
